results.title: Jewish Gifts, Live Laugh Love Sign, Above bed Decor, Wedding Gift, Housewarming Gift, Papercut Art Wall Hanging, Unique LOVE Sign
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Sign, Above bed Decor, Wedding Gift, Housewarming Gift, Papercut Art Wall Hanging, Unique LOVE Sign

This is my Love Wall papercut art. it is made from 11 layers of papercut and it is a truly unique one of a kind gift.
You can hang it in your bedroom or living room wall in your house or you can give it away as a wedding gift and the couple will cherish your gift forever! 

We offer a Laser Cut Wall art with a modern design, made of high-quality paper with a lot of care and creativity. All paper that is used is acid-free to promise many years to enjoy your gift.
All our products are customized at your demand, and we`re open for your personal color preferences. This means that we can provide any other color combinations based on your taste and suggestions.

* Size-9.5x9.5 inch - 24cm x 24cm
* Size with matting and frame - 13"x13" - 33cm x 33cm 
* This listing is with a gold background - you can choose a different color from listed below:
* Choose your background colors:
Gold Leaf, Gold, Natural Brown, Gray, Pearl, Dark Pearl, Silver, Dark Silver, Glitter Lead, Beige, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Black, Olive Green, Burgundy
* You can custom your gift with a different sentence instead of LIVE-LAUGH-LOVE - Please contact me for details.

We will ship your order to your ETSY address. Please make sure it is the correct address. Your order will be carefully wrapped and packed.  
We use UPS International Priority. orders shipped to the US via UPS typically arrive within 5-12 business days. You can upgrade to express delivery at checkout.
We cannot be responsible for any delays due to customs or security. Nor can we be responsible for delays due to strikes or work stoppages in either Israel or the country to which your item is shipped.
delays related to the weather, delays that occur in customs or any other governmental or regulatory agency and delays related to the carrier's negligence.
Customers are responsible for any duties, taxes, or additional charges that may be associated with the shipment.


Thank you,
Noa Attias

results.title: Multi-Strand, Coral Pink Bracelet. Flamingo Inspired. Live Love Laugh Sterling Silver Bar. White Jade, Mother of Pearl, Swarovski Crystals
results.description:
Multi-Strand Coral Pink Bracelet. Flamingo Inspired. Live, Love, Laugh Sterling Silver Bar on a Sterling Silver Satellite Chain. Genuine Gemstones - White Jade, White Agate. Mother-of-Pearl. Karen Hill Tribe Fine Silver, Swarovski Crystals. Six-strand, Adjustable Bracelet Strung with Hand Dyed Silk Cord.

LIVE, LOVE, LAUGH 'FLAMINGO' BRACELET...The fabulous Flamingo...one of the most beautiful creatures on Earth in my opinion. I love just about everything about them...their colors enchant me. The softest pink, vibrant coral pink,  the deepest black and frothy white. The incredible beauty of the arched neck...all of this wonderfulness balancing on those stick legs. Amazing. 

Multi-strand beaded bracelet, strung on 100% Natural Silk Cord*, hand-dyed a gorgeous coral pink..adjustable braided closure. Composed of five strands of genuine gemstones and authentic materials; the sixth strand is a delicate Sterling Silver 'satellite' chain with a Sterling Silver bar stamped with the words: 'Live Love Laugh.' Sterling Silver tube beads, Karen Hill Tribe Fine Silver Beads, soft pink and coral pink seed beads. Sprinkled all through with sparkling pink, genuine Swarovski crystals. Two glass Evil Eyes are strung close together to resemble your Flamingo's eyes. Finally, a saucy little 'Flamingo' charm in Sterling Silver. Luscious, opulent and boho chic.

Bracelet Length: Made to order. See FAQs below for how to measure. You will select your preferred length at checkout. 

*Griffith brand 100% Natural Silk Cord. High tensile strength, designed for stringing pearls and heavy beads.

OPTIONS:
Gobs of options! I absolutely love making these bracelets - so if you would prefer a different color scheme, I can do it! Also, the precious metal choices are Sterling Silver/Fine Silver, Yellow or Rose Gold Fill and Yellow or Rose Vermeil. Just send me a message to discuss custom orders.

results.title: Amethyst Boho Bracelet. Six-strands of Gemstones, Mother-of-Pearl, Swarovski Crystals, Gold Vermeil. Gold Filled Chain. Jewelry Gift for Her
results.description:
Amethyst Boho Bracelet. Six-strands of Gemstones, Mother-of-Pearl, Swarovski Crystals, Gold Vermeil & Gold Filled Chain. Jewelry Gift for Her. Live Love Laugh 18k Gold Vermeil Bar. Handmade USA

BEST FRIEND'S BRACELET

My best friend, Betty, loves purple...and poodles. And, as I love Betty, this one's for her and it will be on its way to North Carolina soon. But, if you like it, I'm sure she wouldn't mind if I make another one! 
Royal purple Amethyst gemstones, wine and indigo Delica beads. Swarovski crystals in indigo blue, amethyst purple, denim blue and a color I can only describe as the color of clear water. White bone, Mother-of-Pearl and loads of 18k Gold Vermeil* and 14k Gold Fill tubes and large shiny balls. genuine materials.  Five strands of beads; the sixth strand is a delicate 14k gold fill ball chain with an 18k Gold Vermeil bar stamped with the words: 'Live Love Laugh.' 

Luscious and opulent and just gorgeous in my opinion...fit for a Queen.

Multi-strand beaded bracelet, my original design created for the woman - like me! - who loves the opulent look of layered bracelets...each complementing the others...all in a lush, six-strand bracelet. Strung on 100% Natural silk cord**, custom-dyed a gorgeous purple/violet...adjustable closure. All genuine gemstones and materials. Adjustable braided closure.

* While the USA standard for authentic 'Vermeil' is 2.5 microns of gold over 92.5 % (Sterling) Silver, our supplier of Vermeil plates 3 microns of gold.

**Griffith brand 100% Natural Silk Cord. High tensile strength, designed for stringing pearls and heavy beads.

OPTIONS:
Gobs of options! I absolutely love making these bracelets - as one can see - so if you would prefer a different color scheme, I can do it! Also, Sterling Silver/Fine Silver can be substituted for the Yellow Gold Filled and 18k Vermeil. Please send me a message to discuss custom orders.

BRACELET SIZE
Please measure your wrist size. You can use a fabric tape measure or even a cord and a ruler. Please measure twice to be sure...and then enter that number at checkout. Your bracelet will be made approximately 1.0 inch larger than the wrist measurement you select. With the adjustable sliding closure, you will be able to add about 2.0 inches to the length for your personal comfort as well as easy on and off.

L👀K! Scroll down to see 'Frequently Asked Questions' (FAQ) for information on:
❓Bracelet Sizing, 
 
📬Domestic Shipping, 🔁Returns & 💲Refunds,
✈️INTERNATIONAL Shipping, 🔁Returns & 💲Refunds,
💎Gemstones & Precious Metals,

results.title: Stone Art "Live Laugh Love" ~ Digital Download
results.description:
Stone Art Live Laugh Love with light pink flowers and matching stone background. 
I have altered the colors and Tones Digitally to offer Peaceful more mysterious vibes. I loved working on this and I love the place that I finished this particular Design. 

This Painting has beauty in Colors and Would look great Printed on Paper and framed or printed on Canvas or metal. 
It looks amazing on your wrist, used as a Watch Face on either an Apple Watch or Android and fitbit watch.

Looks especially great hanging on a wall or used for your laptop or computer screen saver!! because of the peaceful colors and square shape!!!

and always remember to "Be You!!!! Because NO ONE ELSE  in this Entire World can do it EXCEPT YOU!!!! "

results.title: LET'S RESIN Live Mold, Silicone Resin Molds, Good Gift Idea to Creating A Unique Resin Project Thank You Card Included-(E4-LIVE-K)
results.description:
Newest: In stock on July 20, 2020. Pre-order available.


Exclusive Mold: This live mold original designed by LETS RESIN, "Let's Resin" owns the copyright.
Let's Resin Letter Sign Series: LIVE every moment, LAUGH every day, LOVE beyond words.
Creative Resin Gift: simple for all the resin amateur, from the novice to the artist, either alcohol ink or flower-filled the finished project would be very beautiful.
User Tips: Don't use a heat gun or torch to speed harden the resin, It will destroy the mold. Just let it sit 5-10 minutes, after stirring the epoxy resin to reduce the bubbles.

Package Includes
1 x Live mold
4 x Thank you card

results.title: LIFT Laugh Love Tee | Crossfit • Weightlifting Humor • Gym Lover • Fitness Jokes
results.description:
You're alpha AF, but still in touch with your softer side. Gym tested, mother approved.
 
 You've now found the staple t-shirt of your wardrobe. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. Form fitting, and the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite! 
 
 • 100% ring-spun cotton
 • Sport Grey is 90% ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester
 • Dark Heather is 65% polyester, 35% cotton
 • 4.5 oz/y² (153 g/m²)
 • Pre-shrunk
 • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
 • Quarter-turned to avoid crease down the center

Unisex Shirt. Fits true to size for athletic or slim fit type shirts

results.title: Beach Ocean Wall Poster,Live Laugh Love,Circle Wall Art,Beach Wall Poster,Ocean Circle Print,Positive Quote,Sea Wall Art,Seascape Print,
results.description:
Beach Ocean Wall Poster,Live Laugh Love,Circle Wall Art,Beach Wall Poster,Ocean Circle Print,Positive Quote,Sea Wall Art,Seascape Print

We offer High Quality Designs for your home.

YOUR PURCHASE INCLUDES : HIGH RESOLUTION IMAGES, 300 dpi JPG files in seven sizes that can be scaled down.

-20X20"(1X1 Ratio)

-20x30”(2x3 Ratio)

-18x24”(3x4 Ratio)

-16x20”(4x5 Ratio)

-ISO,A0” (33.15x 46.85)

-11x14”

-5x7"

2x3 Ratio file can print:
4x6” - 8x12” - 12x18” - 16x24” - 20x30”

3x4 Ratio file can print:
6x8” - 9x12” - 12x16” - 15x20” - 18x24”

4x5 Ratio file can print:
4x5” - 8x10” - 12x15” - 16x20”

ISO (International Standard Size) file can print:
A0 - A1 - A2 - A3 - A4 - A5

If you need different sizes just message me and i'll gladly resize it for you.


- NOTE -
No physical product will be shipped and the frame is not included. 

Read more about digital downloads here: https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949


HOW DO I PRINT?

You may print this file from your home printer, a local or online photo developer, or a professional printing (i.e. Staples, Kinkos, Costco, etc.)

WHERE TO DOWNLOAD MY FILES?

Digital files are available automatically after purchase payment clears with Etsy at http://www.etsy.com/your/purchases. For guest checkout, you will receive an automated email from Etsy with your download links, please check your junk/spam folder.

- BE AWARE - 
Due to differences in monitor and printer calibrations, colors may appear different in print than on screen. The final print quality will depend on the type of printer and paper used. You may take your digital file to a printer for professional printing if desired.

Thanks for visiting! -  Wallie Mallie

results.title: Live Laugh Love Cut File - SVG, PNG, JPEG dxf - Cricut silhouette, rustic sign svg, home decor svg, Farmhouse decor, welcome home
results.description:
*** This design is also included in a BUNDLE, get it here -->

https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/848093113/sign-bundle-sign-svg-bundle-sign-making?ref=listing_published_alert

💕Handmade item
💕Craft type: Card making & stationery, Printing & printmaking, Scrapbooking
💕Digital Download: 1 ZIP included
💕Materials: SVG, PNG, DXF


💕IMPORTANT! You'll receive a *ZIP folder containing all purchased files. You’ll need a computer to unzip and to open your files! 

YOU WILL RECEIVE:


1 ZIP file containing digital files in the following formats: 
SVG, DXF, PNG.

SVG, DXF, PNG formats allows you to use your files across a wide range of cutting machines. They are suitable for use in Cricut Design Space, Sure Cuts A Lot, Make The Cut, and the Silhouette Designer Edition. 

PLEASE NOTE:
💕 .SVG files are vector files and can be resized (scaled) to any size without losing image quality. Just use vector graphics software to edit my final designs.

💕 If you need another formats of files, just contact me via Etsy convo and I'll help you.

💕 If you have Silhouette Studio Basic Edition you can NOT drag and drop the SVG file into the work area to access the file. Please use the DXF file instead

results.title: LOVE CAT PRISMATIC Mug Multiple Sizes Gift Present Kitten Lover Rescue
results.description:
Due to the coronavirus' impact, it is possible that there may be up to 3 business days added to production time. Please be aware and plan for this if you're shopping for a gift. 

Production cut-off for Father's Day drinkware to arrive via standard shipping is midnight June 7, 2020.

Production cut-off for Father's Day drinkware to arrive via USPS Priority mail upgrade is June 11, 2020.

Crisp graphics adorn this attractive, quality white mug, announcing your passion to the world 

A perfect gift for anyone who cares about our four legged friends! Of course, you need one of these too! Makes a lovely thank you gift or an "I'm glad you're my friend" gift!

- Crisp and clean artwork wraps the mug
- Perfect for right or left handed folks because the pattern is always visible
- Premium quality mug holds 11 or 15 oz of your favorite beverage
- Durable ceramic material with comfortable handle
- Microwave and dishwasher safe

Thanks for checking our listing! There are more unique graphical items available on our website -- we just haven't gotten around to moving everything over to Etsy yet -- so please feel free to stop by anytime!

www.kjpartnersllc.com

Love a message or text but wish it were a different font or color? Love a graphic but want it on a background or a different colored background? Simple changes like these can most times be easily made for a very nominal charge. Contact us and let us know what you have in mind and let us show you what is possible!

If you are thinking of purchasing multiple items as party gifts or favors, for instance, please contact us regards possible quantity discounts! 

We look forward to working with and serving you!

results.title: Today is a New Day Shirt, Chronic Illness and Mental Health T-shirt
results.description:
THIS Today is a New Day t-shirt is great to wear after going through hard times. If you have a chronic illness or experience depression, this shirt can help remind you that everything is going to be okay. 

~~~SHIRT COLORS~~~
Heather Deep Teal
Heather Raspberry


~~~DESIGN COLORS~~~
Shirt design is printed in white for all shirts.


~~~SIZE CHART~~~
All shirts are unisex and are true to size. Check out the size chart in this listing's photos for a visual of how to measure for sizing. We recommend taking a shirt you own and measuring the length and width to determine what size you should purchase.

Size / Chest Width / Length
S / 18” / 28”
M / 20” / 29”
L / 22” / 30"
XL / 24” / 31"
2XL / 26” / 32"
3XL / 28” / 33"
4XL / 30" / 34"


~~~SHIRT DETAILS~~~
• 52% combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester
• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz (142 g/m2)
• Pre-shrunk fabric
• Side-seamed construction
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping

~~~CARE INSTRUCTIONS~~~
Wash inside out in cold water. Tumble try low or hang to dry. Do not bleach. Do not iron directly on design. 


~~~SHIPPING & POLICIES~~~
Please check our Shipping and Policies information to see production and shipping time before purchasing. Since all shirts are made to order, returns and exchanges are not accepted. We care about providing quality service, so please contact us if you have any problems with your order! We're happy to help.

results.title: Set of 6 "live laugh love" note cards with envelopes--Live Laugh Love--friendship card--nature letters--nature lover--rustic friendship card
results.description:
Nature letters spell out Live, Laugh, Love. Perfect to send to a nature-loving friend. This set includes 6 note cards and envelopes in gray and brown earth tones. Cards come in a handmade drawstring bag. Cards are 4.25 inches x 5.5 inches. Inside is blank. Nature letter photos were taken in Reno, Nevada, USA.

One customer said, "I ran out and on short notice needed more of these beautiful cards. Katie completed them the same day I emailed her. I was thrilled! Excellent customer service and of course an excellent product! "
